title: 'Gung Ho!': The Story of Carlson's Makin Island Raiders

sources.title: Gung Ho!
sources.description: Though loaded with clichés such as rousing pre-battle speeches and over-dramatized death scenes, Gung Ho tells a more-or-less true story about the successful deployment of the Makin Raiders (Carlson's Raiders) on a minor Japanese stronghold (Makin Atoll). Fifteen thousand men volunteer, and in the end, only 200 make the team. These two hundred men will adopt the Chinese phrase Gung Ho (roughly translated as working harmoniously) as a philosophical approach to the task at hand.

sources.title: Gung Ho!: The Story of Carlson's Makin Island Raiders (1943)
sources.description: A true-life epic that revolves around an exclusive bataillon of the U.S. Marine Corps during World War II, "Carlson's Raiders," whose assignment is to take control of a South Pacific island once possessed by the United States but now under Japanese command. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/gung-ho-the-story-of-carlsons-makin-island-raiders-1943/

sources.title: Gung Ho! The Story of Carlson's Makin Island Raiders (1943) RANDOLPH SCOTT
sources.description:
Movie Class by PizzaFLIX: American film actor Randolph Scott (1898 –1987) was just 19 years old when the United States entered WWI in 1917 and he enlisted into United States Army. Scott served in France as an artillery observer with the 2nd Trench Mortar Battalion, 19th Field Artillery Regiment. His wartime experience gave him training that he used later during his film career. 

Stars: Randolph Scott, Alan Curtis, Noah Beery Jr. 
Director: Ray Enright

 The true story of Carlson's Raiders and their World War II attack on Makin Island. Watch for a young Robert Mitchum as 'Pig-Iron' Matthews.

sources.title: 'Gung Ho!': The Story of Carlson's Makin Island Raiders (1943) Drama, History, War Full Movie
sources.description:
The true story of Carlson's Raiders and their World War II attack on Makin Island.

Director: Ray Enright
Writers: Lucien Hubbard, W.S. LeFrançois (based on the factual story "GUNG HO" )

Genres: Drama | History | War 

@CultCinemaClassics

metadata.Plot: Seven weeks after Pearl Harbor, volunteers form the new 2nd Marine Raider Battalion whose purpose is to raid Japanese-held islands. The men selected come from different walks of life but have toughness in common. Under command of Colonel 'Thorwald', they're trained in all imaginable forms of combat. Then, after a perilous submarine journey, they face a daunting first mission: to annihilate the much larger Japanese garrison on Makin Island, in a lengthy battle sequence.
metadata.Writer: Lucien Hubbard, W.S. LeFrançois, Joseph Hoffman
metadata.Actors: Randolph Scott, Alan Curtis, Noah Beery Jr.
